_meanings:
{@--1@} 
Stupefying, producing insensibility or
stupor (an epithet applied to
one of the five arrows of Cupid).

{@--2@} Prevalence,
growth, increase (usually {%<ab>n.</ab>%} in this
sense).

{@--3@} A process in metallic
preparation, calcining quicksilver
with sulphur; <ab>cf.</ab> {#mUrcCA#} (3) also.
